I love those movies, the Destron base is named Sulaco and LV-426, both from=
 Aliens. And Dachande had a Alien beast mode, so does Jynx and Praetorian a=
nd the Four Nightmares will soon.
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: C=
YBERWOLF4 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Sunday, December 24, 2000 12:0=
5 PM
  Subject: Re: Tripredacus (Predacons should read)


  What's with the=
 "Alien" reference?

  Nostromo was Ripleys first ship.
    ----- Original =
Message ----- 
    From: dachande 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Sa=
turday, December 23, 2000 5:13 PM
    Subject: Tripredacus (Predacons shoul=
d read)


    Yanshosh and I, so far, are roleplaying these guys. When they=
 combine they are under each of our control, but make sure to read the post=
s of the others so they know what is going on.

    ::Sea Clamp/Cicadon/Ram=
horn::

        The infamous members of the Tripredacus Council had learned=
 of what was going on on past Earth. They decided that it was nessary for t=
heir personal intervention. Preparing a ship to leave they had a crew of ab=
out forty bots, none with Beast Modes. They themselves had reengineered the=
ir bodies to accomadate Beast Modes and a Gestalt.
        The ship, Nostro=
mo, left the dock. It created a Transwarp conduit and went through. Soon th=
ey were all through. Sea Clamp was at the helm, Cicadon was at the Navagati=
on, and Ramhorn was manning the weapons systems. Almost all of the lights h=
ad gone out, all that was on were red warning lights, which would make it d=
ifficult for anybody to see. The crew had been eradicated, no chance for re=
bellion. But, smartly, their Sparks had not been extinguised, they had been=
 stored in small capsules for later use. Tripredacus had been looking for t=
he last remaining ones when they saw something they did not expect. The Ark=
. In Space. They knew this was a great chance, but the last of the remianin=
g Predacons attacked them at that point. They did not have the chance to de=
stroy the Ark. But they would. The last of the rebels had been ejected from=
 the ship.
        The Nostromo had a easy landing. Tripredacus dismanteled=
 the thruster system, Sea Clamp spoke up in a raspy voice. "No one goes hom=
e."
        "Agreed," The other two said. They decided to look for the othe=
r Predacons on this planet, and begin their plan of the destruction of the =
Ark, and the Autobots.


          eGroups Sponsor
